entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
